operations.command:
git merge 011-stop-loss-position-limits --no-ff -m "$(cat <<'EOF'
Merge branch '011-stop-loss-position-limits'

Spec 011: Stop-Loss & Position Limits - Complete Implementation

Features:
- Automatic stop-loss on position open
- Position limit validation (per-instrument + total exposure)
- Trailing stop support
- STOP_MARKET/STOP_LIMIT order types

New files:
- risk/config.py, risk/manager.py, risk/__init__.py
- tests/test_risk_config.py, tests/test_risk_manager.py
- tests/integration/test_risk_backtest.py
- strategies/examples/risk_managed_strategy.py

Test coverage: 63 tests, all passing
EOF
)"
git reset --hard HEAD && rm -f .claude/context_bundles/28_dec_session_7b2df9c9-3898-4fa5-b6c0-f33a51133bf3.json && git status
